english.segment1: Let's, you and me, make our way just beyond Haight Street. Lets leave this life behind, forgetting all they say. The time we had is time well borrowed. Stay out all night, forget tomorrow.
english.segment2: Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know, but too young to care. Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know, but too young to care.
english.segment3: The rear view mirror shows the times we're abandoning. Let's leave this night behind, forgetting all they say. The time we had is time well borrowed. Stay out all night; forget tomorrow.
english.segment4: Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know, but too young to care. Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know, but too young to care.
english.segment5: (Who cares?). If there's trouble tonight, (Who cares?). 'cause the kids are alright. Tonight we'll take this town, 'cause we're old enough to know, but too young to care.
english.segment6: Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know, but too young to care. Let's, you and me, make a night of it. Old enough to know but too young to care.
english.segment7: (Who cares?). If there's trouble tonight, (Who cares?). 'cause the kids are alright. Tonight we'll take this town, 'cause we're old enough to know, but too young to care.
